body_html: A system with two P6000 24GB GPU's just hangs soon after some Tensorflow calculations. Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS. No messages in dmesg and syslog. The workstation has >1000 W PSU. nVidia drivers and CUDA toolkit are the latest as-of June 2nd, 2017. I will have to check the versions later.
